vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.21;
son of: Benjamin (H1144);
brother of: Bela (H1106A), Becher (H1071), Ashbel (H0788), Naaman (H5283), Ehi (H0278), Rosh (H7220), Muppim (H4649), Huppim (H2650H), Ard (H0714), Ahiram (H0297) and Jediael (H3043);
father of: Ehud (H0164)
§ Gera = "a grain"
1) a son of Benjamin
2) a son of Bela and grandson of Benjamin
3) any member of the Gera family of the Benjamite tribe
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de (Bela, hijo de) Benjamín; (b)   padre de Ehud, juez de Israel; (c)   padre de Simí; tribu de Benjamín; (d)   hijo de Ehud; tribu de Benjamín
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
基拉 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "一粒穀粒"
1) 便雅憫的一個兒子 (創46:21)
2) 比拉的兒子，同時也是便雅憫的孫子 (代上8:3,5)
3) 便雅憫支派裡的基拉家族中的任何一人
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
基拉 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "一粒谷粒"
1) 便雅悯的一个儿子 (创46:21)
2) 比拉的儿子，同时也是便雅悯的孙子 (代上8:3,5)
3) 便雅悯支派里的基拉家族中的任何一人

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.16.5;
father of: Shimei (H8096H)
§ Gera = "a grain"
1) a son of Benjamin
2) a son of Bela and grandson of Benjamin
3) any member of the Gera family of the Benjamite tribe

A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.3;
son of: Bela (H1106A);
brother of: Ard (H0714H), Naaman (H5283H), Ezbon (H0675H), Uzzi (H5813I), Uzziel (H5816I), Jerimoth (H3406), Iri (H5901), Addar (H0146H), Abihud (H0031), Abishua (H0050H) and Ahoah (H0265)
§ Gera = "a grain"
1) a son of Benjamin
2) a son of Bela and grandson of Benjamin
3) any member of the Gera family of the Benjamite tribe

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.7;
son of: Ehud (H0164);
brother of: Naaman (H5283J), Ahijah (H0281K), Uzza (H5798H) and Ahihud (H0284); also called Heglam (KJV: "removed"; NIV: "deported") at 1Ch.8.7;
Also named: ga.lah (הֶגְלָם "Heglam" H1540)
§ Gera = "a grain"
1) a son of Benjamin
2) a son of Bela and grandson of Benjamin
3) any member of the Gera family of the Benjamite tribe
